Title: The Sound of One Hand Clapping
Writer: Deborah Cox (script editor), Richard Flanagan (novel), Richard Flanagan (screenplay)
Actors: Kerry Fox, Kristof Kaczmarek, Rosie Flanagan, Arabella Wain
Plot: 36-year-old Sonja Buloh visits his father Bojan in Tasmania's capital after 20 years absence. She left him when he beat her up in a drunken rage, and she finds him a sad alcoholic. That brings back the memories of their hard life 30 years ago when they emigrated to Australia from Slovenia.
